mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(AGENT_NAME, '미등록') AS ADMIN_NAME , IFNULL(AGENT_TITLE, '미등록') AS ADMIN_TITLE , IFNULL(AGENT_WORK, '미등록 부서') AS ADMIN_WORK FROM DP_ADV_AGENT WHERE AGENT_ID = #{adminId}

select b.id ,b.agent_id ,b.agent_name ,b.dept_code ,a.dept_name ,a.p_dept_code ,b.agent_work ,ifnull(c.id,'0') as interest ,b.ext from DP_ADV_DEPT a, DP_ADV_AGENT b left join DP_ADV_INTEREST_AGENT c on b.agent_id = c.agent_id and c.admin_id = #{adminId} /* 접속한 관리자 id */ where a.DEPT_CODE = b.DEPT_CODE and b.DEPT_CODE = (select DEPT_CODE from DP_ADV_AGENT where ext = #{adminExt}) and b.AGENT_TITLE < '팀장'
and a.dept_code in (${deptCode})
and b.agent_name like CONCAT(#{agentName}, '%') /* 이름으로 조회 */
and c.admin_id = #{adminId} /* 관심상담사 조회 */
order by agent_name asc
